text_logic_form: The triangle $RST$ is a right triangle.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The triangle $RST$ is a right triangle.
diagram_logic_form: The measure of angle $STP$ is $150$ degrees.
Point $T$ lies on the line connecting $R$ and $P$.
The lines $RS$ and $TS$ are perpendicular to each other.
line_instances: There are lines $RS$, $ST$, and $RT$, forming the right triangle $RST$.
The line $TP$ is colinear with $RS$ and $RT$.
The line $RP$ is colinear with $RS$ and $RT$.
